name: Breakout Ultimate
description:
Rediscover a classic revisited with this addictive and dynamic brick-breaker.

Like its big brothers Breakout or Arkanoid, the goal of the game is to eliminate all the bricks on the screen with a ball that bounces off the walls and on a finger-controlled racket.

Will you be able to overcome the different level packs available?

Will you manage to collect all the stars?
